snippet: Gen. Martin E. Dempsey, chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff, is asking top military officials to examine what challenges will face American forces in five years and beyond.
abstract: Gen Martin E Dempsey, Joint Chiefs of Staff chairman, and military officials have assembled several times in 2012 to determine what kind of military the nation will require in the next five years; for this 'strategic seminar,' the first of its kind for the Pentagon, they use a giant map of the world to examine a series of potential national security concerns.
lead_paragraph: Gen. Martin E. Dempsey, chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff, is asking top military officials to examine what challenges will face American forces in five years and beyond.

headline.seo: Top General Dempsey Maps Out U.S. Military Future
headline.main: Mapping Military Needs, Aided by a Big Projection
headline.print_headline: Mapping Military Needs, Aided by a Big Projection

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
